Question: The soundtrack failed to chart, but it won this person an Ivor Novello Award for Best Instrumental Theme.
Hints: During the 1990s, this person collaborated twice with Youth of Killing Joke as the musical duo "the Fireman".
In 2010, President Barack Obama honoured this person with the Gershwin Prize for his contributions to popular music.
This person later purchased works by Magritte, using his painting of an apple for the Apple Records logo.
